about_the_game:
Sex monsters - the DLC name is already speaking of itself. It includes very cool sex monsters, dozens undressable male and female monsters ready for fucking in your game. Some of them are naked and some are partially dressed, but you can remove all their clothes. Using different settings, you can create perfect sex monsters and manage them according to your wishes. You will use them as main character and give them orders where they should go and what they have to do. You will decide with whom they will fuck today.

All monsters have working genitals with a lot of different settings. Also, you can change the size of body, make it thin or thick, make an athletic or huge, manage the erection of penis on male characters and set up female's vaginas, clitoris and anuses, boob's size according to your needs.

Try those cool sex monsters one by one to see which one you like most of all.

Just imagine how cool it could be.

  • Memory: 16 GB RAM

  • Storage: 15 GB available space
